tasks.label: Update File Structure
args: echo '3w/' > 'ABC-structural/FileFolderStructure.txt' && find . -type f \( -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -o -name '*.js' -o -name '*.jsx' -o -name '*.json' -o -name '*.css' -o -name '*.md' -o -name '*.txt' -o -name '*.prisma' -o -name '*.sql' -o -name '*.toml' \) | grep -v node_modules | grep -v .git | grep -v .next | sort | sed 's|^\./||' | awk 'BEGIN{print "# Generated on $(date)"} {if(index($0,"/")){dir=substr($0,1,index($0,"/")-1); if(dir!=lastdir){print "├── " dir "/"; lastdir=dir}} print "│   ├── " $0}' >> 'ABC-structural/FileFolderStructure.txt'
